text: Evretou Dam () is the third largest dam in Cyprus and also the largest rock- fill dam on the island. It lies at an altitude of 165 m and is located about 15 km south of Polis Chrysochou, next to the abandoned village of Evretou. It is part of the Chrysochou Irrigation Project, the construction of which cost a total of CYP £21,000,000.Water Development Department, Chrysochou Irrigation Project == See also == * List of reservoirs and dams in Cyprus == References == Category:Dams in Cyprus Category:Dams completed in 1986 Category:Buildings and structures in Paphos District Category:1986 establishments in Cyprus
title: Evretou Dam
